description:
WebView wrapper for Mistral Le Chat with URL blocking and privacy features
Assistral is a simple WebView wrapper for Mistral Le Chat. It blocks all URLs which are not essential for functioning.

Features:
• Secure WebView wrapper for Mistral's Le Chat AI assistant
• URL blocking to prevent tracking and unnecessary requests
• Toggle button to switch between restricted and unrestricted mode
• Support for file uploads and downloads
• Voice input support for conversations
• Clean, minimal interface focused on the chat experience

The app does not support login via Apple, Microsoft, or Google account - please use a web browser for initial sign up if needed.

You can switch URL blocking on/off by clicking the button at the top right. Swipe up a bit to hide the button for a cleaner view.

This app provides a focused, privacy-conscious way to access Mistral's powerful AI chat interface without the distractions and tracking of a full web browser.
